name: Shp Space
description:
You need to destroy obstacles named shield that built specially for the level on its own. After passing the stages, You must collect the stuff at the end of the stages. You will get the reason of that at the end of the game.

Different Difficulty modes can be added
I am working on graphical things. Character Views and Perimeter edits will be added.


5 different characters
10 different Enemies

5 different levels (each level has 5-6-7 sub levels)
29 playable levels in total
2 final scenes

interaction keys : F , G , Space
